price: 16. Buku oyo Allah azali kokamba na yango, baye balandi bosepeli naye banzela ya kimia. Mpe azali kobimisa bango na molili kotia bango na mwinda na ndingisa naye, mpe kokamba bango na nzela ya semba.
arabic: يَهۡدِي بِهِ ٱللَّهُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ رِضۡوَٰنَهُۥ سُبُلَ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ وَيُخۡرِجُهُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَيَهۡدِيهِمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yahdī bihi al-lahu mani ittabaʿa riḍ'wānahu subula al-salāmi wayukh'rijuhum mina al-ẓulumāti ilā al-nūri bi-idh'nihi wayahdīhim ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
